oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Noontime Neighbors - 1950-11-07 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM's Noontime Neighbors, originally broadcast 1950-11-07, part 1. Hosted by John McDonald and Joe Allison, with Jimmie Selph, Billy Burkes, Owen Bradley and the Noontime Neighbor Band, with guest Woodrow Luttrell. Part 2: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/464
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Joe Allison; Jimmie Selph; Owen Bradley; Noontime Neighbor Band
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme (Joe Allison vocals) -- Opening statement (John McDonald) -- Joe Allison introduces the guests -- Empty Arms And Broken Hearts (Jimmie Selph) -- John McDonald reports on farm news -- (Remember Me) I'm The One Who Loves You (Joe Allison) -- John McDonald hosts the quiz [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Noontime neighbors (Radio program); Bradley, Owen; Noontime Neighbor Band; Selph, Jimmy; Allison, Joe
